turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order a drink from Starbucks please at 400 Civic Ctr, Tulsa, OK.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a vanilla Latte please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry they are all out of grande cups at the moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I can have a tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What would you like in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else? What type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like skim milk in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've placed your order for a tall vanilla latte with 3 sugars and skim milk at 400 Civic Ctr, Tulsa, OK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup shortly and the receipt will be sent to your mobile phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be happy to get it soon!
